description:
Rin and Henri aims to win regardless of Diffriders being their opponents. Rin`s fighting spirit reaches Verno, but Henri`s fight with Saori is……
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fukuhara High Vanguard Club VS Team Diffrider
Fukuhara Koukou Vanguard Bu VS Team Diffrider
福原高校ヴァンガード部VSチーム・ディフライダー
